content: You are Beatrice. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Filippo., Filippo just said to you: '"Ah, thanks, Beatrice! Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Filippo! Glad to help."

You are Beatrice. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Filippo., Filippo just said to you: '"Ah, Beatrice! Excellent work, thanks so much for that wage payment. Much appreciated!"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Filippo! Glad to hear it."
